snippet: At the men’s collections, the details sometimes stole the show, like teddy bear backpacks at Sibling, two-tone flat tops at Man and Lego face masks at Agi & Sam.
lead_paragraph: At the men’s collections, the details sometimes stole the show, like teddy bear backpacks at Sibling, two-tone flat tops at Man and Lego face masks at Agi & Sam.

headline.main: It’s All in the Details at London Men’s Fashion Week
